text: Samuel "Sam" Lacey (March 8, 1948 - March 14, 2014) was an American professional basketball player. He played as a center. He played for the Cincinnati Royals / Kansas City-Omaha Kings, New Jersey Nets, and Cleveland Cavaliers in a thirteen-season career in the National Basketball Association (NBA). Lacey was born in Indianola, Mississippi to an African American family. After basketball, he worked in real estate. Lacey died from natural causes on March 14, 2014 in Kansas City, Missouri, aged 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sam Lacey at Basketball-Reference Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Cleveland Cavaliers players Category:National Basketball Association players with retired numbers Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi
title: Sam Lacey
